notes: Summary: Mother Goose is sitting up in bed with all the feathers on her head standing up.

128.series: June 20, 1992) "Peg Leg Pete, Dead Eye Dick, Hernia Harold"*
notes: Summary: Three gunfighters of the old West are shown, one with an artificial leg, one with an eyepatch, and one in pain.

129.title: Mother Goose & Grimm
129.author: by Mike Peters.
notes: Summary: Mother Goose brings Grimm some yummy dog food.

130.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: Mom considers minor cosmetic surgery.

131.series: Oct. 15, 1992) "I Considered Becoming a Police Dog, But I Don't Like Donuts"

132.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: An aged Kirk and Spock are shown in wheelchairs.

133.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: Grimm has put on a clown face.

134.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: Grimmy is dumping shoes, combs, egg shells, fishbones and apple cores out of a bag labelled dog food.

135.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: He's going to hold his breath until he turns white.

136.title: Mother Goose & Grimm
136.author: by Mike Peters.
notes: Summary: Grimm warns Attila away from his house of cards, but Attilla climbs to the top for a nap without disturbing them.

notes: Summary: Mother Goose is asked if Grimm is a working breed.

139.series: Sept. 7, 1993) "Dracula's Plan Was Working Perfectly Except for One Minor Oversight"
notes: Summary: The professor has him trapped in a hall of mirrors.

140.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: The check-out elephant has trouble getting the zebras to scan.

141.title: Mother Goose & Grimm

notes: Summary: Grimm ate the whole box of donuts.
